content.question: The distance between the plates of a capacitor is decreased without changing the charge. Which of the following describes the changes to the capacitance of the capacitor and the electric field between the plates?

choices.label: The capacitance increases and the electric field decreases.
The capacitance remains the same and the electric field decreases.
The capacitance increases and the electric field remains the same.
Both the capacitance and the electric field increase.

content.answer: The capacitance increases and the electric field remains the same.
